t: Using the Amazon SES SMTP interface to send email - Amazon Simple Email Service
s: Send email through Amazon SES by using the SMTP interface.

t: What Is SMTP? - SMTP Server Explained - AWS
s: What is Simple Mail Transfer Protocol how and why businesses use Simple Mail Transfer Protocol, and how to use Simple Mail Transfer Protocol with AWS.

t: Amazon Brand Registry | Sell on Amazon
s: Enroll your brand in Amazon Brand Registry to unlock tools designed to protect and build your brand, creating a better experience for your Amazon customers.

t: Cloud Email Sending Service - Amazon Simple Email Service - AWS
s: 2 days ago - Amazon Simple Email Service (SES) is a cost-effective, flexible, and scalable email service provider that allows developers to send email from within any application.

t: Amazon Simple Email Service Pricing | Cloud Email Service | Amazon Web Services
s: Amazon Simple Email Service (SES) is a pay-as-you-go service based on the volume of emails sent and received. There are no subscriptions, no contract negotiations, and no minimum charges.

t: Use Amazon SES to set up and connect to SMTP | AWS re:Post
s: May 7, 2020 - Under Simple Mail Transfer Protocol (SMTP) settings, note the values for SMTP endpoints and ports. Use the SMTP endpoint and ports to connect to SMTP. For example, if you're in the eu-west-1 AWS Region, then note the following endpoint and ports: SMTP endpoint: email-smtp.eu-west-1.amazonaws.com ...

t: Configure Amazon SES as External SMTP Email Provider
s: Provide a From email address, then enter your SMTP server Host, Port, Username, and Password, and click Save. You can use email-smtp.us-east-1.amazonaws.com (using the appropriate region rather than us-east-1) for Host and 587 for Port.

t: Amazon Simple Email Service FAQs | Cloud Email Service | Amazon Web Services
s: 2 days ago - Amazon SES allows you to create a private SMTP relay for use with any existing SMTP client software, including software that you develop yourself, or any third-party software that can send email using the SMTP protocol.

t: Obtaining Amazon SES SMTP credentials - Amazon Simple Email Service
s: You need Amazon SES SMTP credentials to access the SES SMTP interface.

t: Connecting to an Amazon SES SMTP endpoint - Amazon Simple Email Service
s: Lists the Amazon SES SMTP endpoints for the regions in which Amazon SES is available.

t: Brand Assets and Resources - SMTP.com
s: July 26, 2022 - Get access to SMTP.com's brand marks - logo and other designations that represent SMTP.com products and services.

t: SMTP relay - Amazon Simple Email Service
s: Describes how to use SMTP relay in Mail Manager in Amazon SES.

t: What is Amazon SES? - Amazon Simple Email Service
s: Use Amazon SES to send marketing emails such as special offers, transactional emails such as order confirmations, and other types of correspondence such as newsletters and system notifications. You can also use Amazon SES to receive email. When you use Amazon SES to receive mail, Amazon SES ...

t: Using Amazon SES along other alternative SMTP services — Sendy Forum
s: December 21, 2017 - On the page https://sendy.co/forum/discussion/10783/using-amazon-ses-along-other-alternative-smtp-services it's mentioned that "You can use Amazon SES SMTP credentials in the brand instead of Amazon SES API keys in the main settings.".

t: Amazon Simple Email Service Features | Cloud Email Service | Amazon Web Services
s: 2 days ago - Amazon SES's flexible IP deployment and email authentication options help drive higher deliverability and protect sender reputation. Analytics measure the impact of each email.

So you can build good-looking transactional emails that fit with your brand identity.  ... SMTP relay API and email marketing are available ...

s: Use common command line utilities to test your connection to the Amazon SES SMTP interface.
